title.rendered: Penthouse Paws Brings the Future of Pet Care to the LA County Fair

content.rendered:
Penthouse Paws: The Peak of Pet Hydration and Feeding Technology

The future of pet care is here – and it’s luxuriously high-tech.

Pet Tech Innovator Penthouse Paws Brings Luxury and Convenience to the LA County Fair.

POMONA, CA, UNITED STATES, April 25, 2024 /EINPresswire.com/ — Calling all pet lovers. Get ready to experience the future of pet care at the LA County Fair, happening from Friday, May 3rd to Monday, May 27th, 2024. Penthouse Paws, a leading pet tech company, will be showcasing their revolutionary smart pet feeders and smart water fountains at their pop-up shop in Expo Hall 4 North, Booth D-4340.

Penthouse Paws is dedicated to making pet care easier and more efficient for pet owners. Their smart pet feeders and water fountains use advanced technology to ensure that pets are always well-fed and hydrated, even when their owners are away. The company’s mission is to revolutionize the way we care for our furry friends, and they are excited to share their innovative products with the public at the LA County Fair.

The LA County Fair is the perfect platform for Penthouse Paws to showcase their cutting-edge pet tech. With over 1.3 million attendees each year, the fair is a popular destination for families and pet owners alike. This year, visitors can look forward to seeing Penthouse Paws’ products in action and learning more about how they can improve their pet care routine.

“We are thrilled to be a part of the LA County Fair and to have the opportunity to introduce our smart pet feeders and water fountains to the public,” says Penthouse Paws Founder and CEO Nick Mikhail. “We believe that our products will revolutionize the way pet owners care for their furry companions, and we can’t wait to share this technology with the community.”

Don’t miss out on this exciting opportunity to see the future of pet care at the LA County Fair. Make sure to mark your calendars for Friday, May 3rd to Monday, May 27th, 2024 and visit Penthouse Paws’ pop-up shop in Expo Hall 4 North, Booth D-4340. For more information about Penthouse Paws and their products, visit their website at www.penthousepaws.com.

Penthouse Paws
Penthouse Paws
